#summary Android on BeagleBoard information page

= Introduction =

This page collects hardware-related or low-level notes about Android on !BeagleBoard. It also contains information regarding features features, hardware limitations and many other hardware-specific or low-level topics relevant for Android

We strongly recommend to get familiar with !BeagleBoard resources at *[http://www.beagleboard.org www.beagleboard.org]*

=== Board Revisions Tested ===
We are verifying regular builds on *C3* revision. It also expected work on *B7* and *C2*
